name: Unstabadome
description:
Description Unstabadome is a high speed, high action, first person arena shooter where the announcer is unstable and can't quite decide what the rules of the game are. Made for and during Ludum Dare 49 Controls Movement = WASD / Arrowkeys
Jump = Space
Look around = mouse movment
Switch selected weapon = Q or scrollwheel
Fire weapon = LMB (Left mouse button)
Pause game = Escape Scoreboard Credits Programming n' such @Dj-Depressive (Maximilian Wallis Hjorth):  Project management and game core programming @theheheo (Theodore Liem Norell): Level design & programming for interactables, improved player movement and player weapons @Kirren (Erik (kire) torenstam): Enemy programming @Bloobird (Jay Rohkea): Player movement base Audio @Water-Duck (Joel Ekberg): Sounds effects and audio implementation @Hugorrrrr (Hugo Röisland): Music n' Sound Effects @Norseman (Adam Asplund): Announcer voice acting Art @karin-g (Karin): Concept art, modeling and animation for enemies @Norseman (Adam Asplund): Player model and shotgun @Norrguld (Oscar Jakobsson): VFX & rpg Things we want to promote Other games by Zapphire Studios Discord server run by @Norrguld & @Kirren
